attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand that the Government stop this intolerable proposal to make it a criminal offence to openly object to homosexuality, or to be considered 'homophobic' by objecting to homosexuals adopting children. Where I have no objection whatsoever to homosexuals, I abhor the bullying tactics of this Government to threaten our freedom of speech on this, or indeed any other matter. They have no right to tell us what to say or think.  Let democracy, and common sense, reign!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
